website_summaries.verdict: The Toshiba L2200U series is a barebones HDTV line with few features and middling performance, even if the price is reasonable.

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but good
customer_reviews.text: For the price, a nice TV. Perfectly functional and easy to adjust color settings. It has audio outputs so you can hook it up to the stereo for better sound. The remote is easy to use (not backlit unfortunately), with the "input" button right on top, so you can switch back and forth between TV, Roku, DVD, etc. My only complaint is that you have to reset the picture size every time you change input type. If your expectations are high, I'd recommend something fancier; if you just want to watch Hulu or Netflix, this TV will do just fine.
customer_reviews.author: jmichaelss

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice tv, and I got it at a very good price. At first I didn't think the picture was very clear, but then I exchanged my old cable box for an HDTV cable box (free exchange at the cable company). Now the picture is amazingly bright and clear. I adjusted the color a bit, and it's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Photo is Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: The photo for this item shows a pedestal base which is the only reason I chose this particular TV. The TV I received does NOT have a pedestal base, it has two separate stand legs on the ends which will require me to purchase a different table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love the tv
customer_reviews.text: I acqurie this for a replacement for my monitor. The old monitor started 'flickering". It would last hours sometimes. Now I can watch cabel and switch to computer!!!!!! I had problem with the icons being too big. I figured out it was easy to fix by adjusting the zoom. Overall it's good flat screen and LCD!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: It's an LED TV
customer_reviews.text: Picture is clear, it hooked up quickly & easily to my AppleTV . I erred in assuming it had a built in HDTuner since most teevees do these days, and have not found a decent antenna to pull in the signal yet, but I have AppleTV and so Netflix Hulu Plus and Aereo can all be broadcast via it. It is a decent tv for a decent price. nothing to write home about, it's a television
customer_reviews.author: Gr8shoes

customer_reviews.title: Just okay
customer_reviews.text: I was told Toshiba was a pretty good brand, but I don't love it. Sometimes the remote acts funny and I have to get closer to the television for the remote to actually work. Also the reaction from the remote is a little delayed for example it takes about 10 seconds for the tv to power on.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Nice TV
customer_reviews.text: I think the picture and features made this TV a good buy. I was leery of a different brands (Sa#$%^&) quality after a bad experience. Nothing to complain about and a good picture to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Hofslund

customer_reviews.title: Great TV for the price
customer_reviews.text: My first Toshiba tv and I was pleasantly surprised. The sound is very good and the picture quality is great. The advertising stated that this tv has an ear phone jack but it does not have one.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: It's a tv!
customer_reviews.text: The price is great, has two HDMI ports and the picture quality is great. Upgrading a family members CRT on the cheap, couldn't ask for anything else really. Added a Chromecast to this bad boy and it's a smart TV at a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: C. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good product, fulfilled my expectations, thank the seller for me to get my time item. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Winston Villabona

customer_reviews.title: As wish
customer_reviews.text: Toshiba is a great TV manufacturer, The tv works great, looks great, is very light, I'm completely satisfied with my product.
customer_reviews.author: ChrisK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Picture and Easy to Operate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV because I had a size limitation inside a cabinet. Most of the big named TV manufacture’s had a physically larger size that this Toshiba 32L2200U TV. Granted I was unsure of Toshiba brand but I was limited in my choices. I have been very satisfied in the operation and the picture quality. This TV even surprised me by automatically changing the input source from cable to video when my DVD player starts.
customer_reviews.author: Keith P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought this TV during a promotion, and I am very glad that I did. The image is clear, and the speakers are good for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Client Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Good picture and price
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these about a month ago and was so pleased that I bought another one a few days ago. Shipping was prompt (as expected with Amazon) and both tv's came in perfect mechanical and cosmetic shape. Another reviewer talked about the picture turning brown or red - I have never experienced this; I find the picture and sound to be pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: todd

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: great tv at an awsome price. I cannot wait to buy another jejejeje i hope i can find the same offer
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: 32L2200U 32-inch
customer_reviews.text: Nice TV for the bedroom. My wife didn't want anything bigger. She's the one that uses a TV in the bedroom, now I can't get her out of it, (Not all bad)
customer_reviews.author: knives

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this TV is that it takes a few seconds for the TV to turn on since hitting ON button. I don't know if that's a standard thing, but it's kind of annoying. Once it's on, it works great. Very light too.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: A great mid-size LED
customer_reviews.text: Good picture, PC imput, low power consumption, seems good to me, I don't have problems with the remote. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 because it's a little slower changing channels than I would like it to be. Sound seems good.
customer_reviews.author: vifmxol

customer_reviews.title: Out of focus
customer_reviews.text: A terrible quality picture. Returned it for a Samsung 32" and was glad I did. Samsung worked great out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Swede S

customer_reviews.title: tv is not working!!
customer_reviews.text: it doesnt work no power!!!! i cant use it!!! how can i use this tv if there is no power????
customer_reviews.author: April Rose Rosal

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy this TV. I bought this TV ...
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this TV. I bought this TV less than 2 years ago and it would turn off and on automatically. Now it will not turn on at all. Now it will cost more to fix it than the TV is worth.
customer_reviews.author: Clint House

customer_reviews.title: Should have looked at reviews
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on Toshiba reputation alone. Pros: low cost,energy star ,light weight Cons: Picture turns a odd reddish on various scenes, If you want to use an off air antenna you better have a really good one with an amplifier. This replaced a old Sony CRT type and the color is just not as good. My advice is look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Buyalot

product_meta.title: Toshiba 32L2200U 32-Inch LED-lit 60Hz TV
product_meta.description: High-value led with new aero design the 32-Inch l2200u hdtv delivers the perfect combination of toshiba quality, new picture and sound technologies and energy-efficient led backlighting at a value others can't beat. and with the sleek new aero design, it looks great with any decor. Warranty - limited warranty - 1 year. Technical information - screen size 32-Inch.
